DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of collection represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to subject characteristics._The date on which the sample or data was collected.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.21.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date the subject
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date the subject characteristic(s) was collected?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record date the subject characteristic(s) was collected using the format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SCDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable SCDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of collection can be determined from a collected date of the visit (VISDAT) and in such cases a date field is not required.
